Title: Establishment of attribute bitmaps for efficient xacml policy evaluation

Title: SC-WS: A context-based, aspect-oriented approach for handling security concerns in web services

Authors: 陳昱仁, 廖耕億, 吳孟哲
Title: 應用 XACML 架構達到安全的雲端資料分享-以政府機關私有雲為例
